Body:
with codecs.open('testdata/models/routing_bicycle.json', mode='r', encoding
    ='utf-8') as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://route.ls.hereapi.com/routing/7.2/calculateroute.json',
    expectedResponse, status=200)
response = self._api.bicycle_route([41.9798, -87.8801], [41.9043, -87.9216])
expected_short_route = (
    'Mannheim Rd; W Belmont Ave; Cullerton St; N Landen Dr; E Fullerton Ave; N Wolf Rd; W North Ave; N Clinton Ave; E Third St; N Caroline Ave'
    )
self.assertEqual(response.route_short, expected_short_route)
responses.activate
